reviewText:
But the 2nd most important thing is to make a million dollars from your project.

Just kidding!

DVD features 3 science fair planning videos from Discovery Education, organizational and time-management tips, and how to create an impressive display. Vids include: The scientific method, How to prepare a science fair project, and Get inspired with footage from the annual Disc Channel young scientist challenge.

On 2nd thought, maybe inventors should buy this DVD as well as students...
